A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Early audience ratings seem a bit harsh to me. Born in the 70's\, I grew up on Star Wars and was very pleased with this next installment of the saga. Had some slightly goofy humor at odd times and a few questions were either left unanswered or unsatisfactorily answered but overall\, I'm looking forward to seeing it again! The force is strong with this one.
